document.full_text: cucumbers imported from spain may be the source of an e. coli outbreak that germany says has killed four people and affected at least 200 more, european health officials said thursday.
document.title: spanish cucumbers may be e.coli source, germans say
lines_and_colors: cucumbers imported from spain may be the source of an e. coli outbreak that germany says has killed four people and affected at least 200 more, european health officials said thursday.
